targets.rawSql:
WITH latest AS (
  SELECT
    SUM(COALESCE(slots_skipped_delta, 0)) as total_skipped,
    SUM(COALESCE(leader_slots_assigned_delta, 0)) as total_assigned
  FROM solana_block_production_delta
  WHERE time >= $__timeFrom()
    AND time <= $__timeTo()
    AND slots_skipped_delta IS NOT NULL
    AND leader_slots_assigned_delta IS NOT NULL
    AND leader_slots_assigned_delta > 0
)
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN total_assigned > 0 THEN CAST(total_skipped::DOUBLE / total_assigned AS DOUBLE)
    ELSE NULL
  END as value
FROM latest

WITH latest AS (
  SELECT
    SUM(COALESCE(blocks_produced_delta, 0)) as total_produced,
    SUM(COALESCE(leader_slots_assigned_delta, 0)) as total_assigned
  FROM solana_block_production_delta
  WHERE time >= $__timeFrom()
    AND time <= $__timeTo()
    AND blocks_produced_delta IS NOT NULL
    AND leader_slots_assigned_delta IS NOT NULL
    AND leader_slots_assigned_delta > 0
)
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN total_assigned > 0 THEN CAST(total_produced::DOUBLE / total_assigned AS DOUBLE)
    ELSE NULL
  END as value
FROM latest

SELECT COALESCE(COUNT(DISTINCT vote_account_pubkey), 0) as value
FROM solana_vote_account_activity_raw
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND time <= $__timeTo()
  AND ('${vote_account:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR vote_account_pubkey IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${vote_account:raw}', ','))))
  AND ('${is_delinquent:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR is_delinquent::text IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${is_delinquent:raw}', ','))))

SELECT COALESCE(COUNT(DISTINCT vote_account_pubkey), 0) as value
FROM solana_vote_account_activity_raw
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND time <= $__timeTo()
  AND is_delinquent = true
  AND ('${vote_account:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR vote_account_pubkey IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${vote_account:raw}', ','))))

SELECT CAST(COALESCE(SUM(activated_stake_sol), 0) AS DOUBLE) as value
FROM (
  SELECT vote_account_pubkey, activated_stake_sol
  FROM (
    SELECT vote_account_pubkey, activated_stake_sol,
      ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY vote_account_pubkey ORDER BY time DESC) AS rn
    FROM solana_vote_account_activity_raw
    WHERE time >= $__timeFrom()
      AND time <= $__timeTo()
      AND ('${vote_account:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR vote_account_pubkey IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${vote_account:raw}', ','))))
      AND ('${is_delinquent:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR is_delinquent::text IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${is_delinquent:raw}', ','))))
      AND activated_stake_sol IS NOT NULL
  ) ranked
  WHERE rn = 1
) latest

SELECT CAST(MAX(cluster_slot) AS DOUBLE) as value
FROM solana_vote_account_activity_raw
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND time <= $__timeTo()

SELECT CAST(MAX(epoch) AS DOUBLE) as value
FROM solana_block_production_raw
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND time <= $__timeTo()

SELECT
  time,
  leader_identity_pubkey as metric,
  CAST(produce_rate_cum AS DOUBLE) as "Produce Rate"
FROM solana_block_production_delta
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND time <= $__timeTo()
  AND produce_rate_cum IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY time ASC, produce_rate_cum ASC

SELECT
  time,
  CAST(AVG(cluster_slot - root_slot) AS DOUBLE) as "Avg Root Lag (slots)",
  CAST(PERCENTILE_CONT(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY cluster_slot - root_slot) AS DOUBLE) as "Median Root Lag (slots)",
  CAST(PERCENTILE_CONT(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY cluster_slot - root_slot) AS DOUBLE) as "P95 Root Lag (slots)",
  CAST(MAX(cluster_slot - root_slot) AS DOUBLE) as "Max Root Lag (slots)"
FROM solana_vote_account_activity_raw
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND time <= $__timeTo()
  AND ('${vote_account:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR vote_account_pubkey IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${vote_account:raw}', ','))))
  AND ('${is_delinquent:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR is_delinquent::text IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${is_delinquent:raw}', ','))))
  AND cluster_slot >= root_slot
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time,
  vote_account_pubkey as metric,
  CAST(SUM(credits_delta) AS DOUBLE) as "Credits Accrued"
FROM solana_vote_account_activity_raw
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND time <= $__timeTo()
  AND credits_delta IS NOT NULL
  AND ('${vote_account:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR vote_account_pubkey IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${vote_account:raw}', ','))))
  AND ('${is_delinquent:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR is_delinquent::text IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${is_delinquent:raw}', ','))))
GROUP BY time, vote_account_pubkey
ORDER BY time, vote_account_pubkey

SELECT
  time,
  CASE WHEN is_delinquent THEN 'Delinquent' ELSE 'Active' END as metric,
  CAST(COUNT(DISTINCT vote_account_pubkey) AS DOUBLE) as "Vote Accounts"
FROM solana_vote_account_activity_raw
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND time <= $__timeTo()
  AND ('${vote_account:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR vote_account_pubkey IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${vote_account:raw}', ','))))
GROUP BY time, is_delinquent
ORDER BY time, is_delinquent

WITH validator_credits AS (
  SELECT
    va.vote_account_pubkey,
    va.node_identity_pubkey,
    va.activated_stake_sol,
    va.commission,
    va.is_delinquent,
    CAST(AVG(va.cluster_slot - va.last_vote_slot) AS DOUBLE) as avg_vote_lag,
    CAST(MAX(va.cluster_slot - va.last_vote_slot) AS DOUBLE) as max_vote_lag,
    CAST(AVG(va.cluster_slot - va.root_slot) AS DOUBLE) as avg_root_lag,
    CAST(MAX(va.cluster_slot - va.root_slot) AS DOUBLE) as max_root_lag,
    CAST(SUM(va.credits_delta) AS DOUBLE) as total_credits_accrued,
    CAST(MAX(va.credits_epoch_credits) AS DOUBLE) as current_epoch_credits,
    COUNT(va.credits_delta) as non_null_delta_count,
    MIN(va.time) as first_seen,
    MAX(va.time) as last_seen
  FROM solana_vote_account_activity_raw va
  WHERE va.time >= $__timeFrom()
    AND va.time <= $__timeTo()
    AND (CASE WHEN '${vote_account:raw}' = '__ALL__' THEN true ELSE va.vote_account_pubkey IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${vote_account:raw}', ','))) END)
    AND (CASE WHEN '${is_delinquent:raw}' = '__ALL__' THEN true ELSE va.is_delinquent::text IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${is_delinquent:raw}', ','))) END)
  GROUP BY va.vote_account_pubkey, va.node_identity_pubkey, va.activated_stake_sol, va.commission, va.is_delinquent
)
SELECT
  vc.vote_account_pubkey as "Vote Account",
  vc.node_identity_pubkey as "Node Identity",
  CAST(COALESCE(vc.activated_stake_sol, 0) AS DOUBLE) as "Activated Stake (SOL)",
  CAST(COALESCE(vc.commission, 0) AS DOUBLE) as "Commission %",
  CASE
    WHEN (SELECT COALESCE(MAX(total_credits_accrued), 0) FROM validator_credits) > 0 AND vc.non_null_delta_count > 0 THEN CAST((vc.total_credits_accrued / (SELECT COALESCE(MAX(total_credits_accrued), 1) FROM validator_credits) * 100.0) AS DOUBLE)
    ELSE NULL
  END as "Earned Credits %",
  vc.is_delinquent as "Delinquent",
  vc.avg_vote_lag as "Avg Vote Lag (slots)",
  vc.max_vote_lag as "Max Vote Lag (slots)",
  vc.avg_root_lag as "Avg Root Lag (slots)",
  vc.max_root_lag as "Max Root Lag (slots)",
  vc.total_credits_accrued as "Total Credits Accrued",
  vc.current_epoch_credits as "Current Epoch Credits"
FROM validator_credits vc
ORDER BY "Activated Stake (SOL)" DESC
LIMIT 100

SELECT
  time,
  leader_identity_pubkey as metric,
  CAST(produce_rate_cum AS DOUBLE) as "Produce Rate"
FROM solana_block_production_delta
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND time <= $__timeTo()
  AND produce_rate_cum IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY time ASC, produce_rate_cum ASC

SELECT
  time,
  leader_identity_pubkey as metric,
  CAST(COALESCE(slots_skipped_delta, 0) AS DOUBLE) as "Skipped Slots (Hourly Delta)"
FROM solana_block_production_delta
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND time <= $__timeTo()
  AND slots_skipped_delta IS NOT NULL
  AND slots_skipped_delta > 0
ORDER BY time ASC, slots_skipped_delta DESC

WITH recent_skips AS (
  SELECT
    leader_identity_pubkey,
    time,
    slots_skipped_delta,
    LAG(slots_skipped_delta) OVER (PARTITION BY leader_identity_pubkey ORDER BY time) as prev_skipped_delta
  FROM solana_block_production_delta
  WHERE time >= $__timeFrom()
    AND time <= $__timeTo()
    AND slots_skipped_delta IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT
  time,
  leader_identity_pubkey as metric,
  CAST(slots_skipped_delta - COALESCE(prev_skipped_delta, 0) AS DOUBLE) as "Rising Skip Rate Trend"
FROM recent_skips
WHERE slots_skipped_delta > COALESCE(prev_skipped_delta, 0)
ORDER BY time ASC, (slots_skipped_delta - COALESCE(prev_skipped_delta, 0)) DESC

SELECT
  time,
  CAST(AVG(cluster_slot - last_vote_slot) AS DOUBLE) as "Avg Vote Lag (slots)",
  CAST(PERCENTILE_CONT(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY cluster_slot - last_vote_slot) AS DOUBLE) as "Median Vote Lag (slots)",
  CAST(PERCENTILE_CONT(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY cluster_slot - last_vote_slot) AS DOUBLE) as "P95 Vote Lag (slots)",
  CAST(PERCENTILE_CONT(0.99) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY cluster_slot - last_vote_slot) AS DOUBLE) as "P99 Vote Lag (slots)",
  CAST(MAX(CASE WHEN NOT is_delinquent THEN cluster_slot - last_vote_slot ELSE NULL END) AS DOUBLE) as "Max Vote Lag (non-delinquent)"
FROM solana_vote_account_activity_raw
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND time <= $__timeTo()
  AND ('${vote_account:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR vote_account_pubkey IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${vote_account:raw}', ','))))
  AND ('${is_delinquent:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR is_delinquent::text IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${is_delinquent:raw}', ','))))
  AND cluster_slot >= last_vote_slot
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time,
  CAST(AVG(cluster_slot - root_slot) AS DOUBLE) as "Avg Root Lag (slots)",
  CAST(PERCENTILE_CONT(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY cluster_slot - root_slot) AS DOUBLE) as "Median Root Lag (slots)",
  CAST(PERCENTILE_CONT(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY cluster_slot - root_slot) AS DOUBLE) as "P95 Root Lag (slots)",
  CAST(PERCENTILE_CONT(0.99) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY cluster_slot - root_slot) AS DOUBLE) as "P99 Root Lag (slots)"
FROM solana_vote_account_activity_raw
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND time <= $__timeTo()
  AND ('${vote_account:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR vote_account_pubkey IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${vote_account:raw}', ','))))
  AND ('${is_delinquent:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR is_delinquent::text IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${is_delinquent:raw}', ','))))
  AND cluster_slot >= root_slot
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time,
  vote_account_pubkey as metric,
  CAST(SUM(COALESCE(credits_delta, 0)) AS DOUBLE) as "Credits Accrued"
FROM solana_vote_account_activity_raw
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND time <= $__timeTo()
  AND ('${vote_account:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR vote_account_pubkey IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${vote_account:raw}', ','))))
  AND ('${is_delinquent:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR is_delinquent::text IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${is_delinquent:raw}', ','))))
  AND credits_delta IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY time, vote_account_pubkey
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time,
  vote_account_pubkey as metric,
  CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN is_delinquent THEN 1 END) AS DOUBLE) as "Delinquent"
FROM solana_vote_account_activity_raw
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND time <= $__timeTo()
  AND ('${vote_account:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR vote_account_pubkey IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${vote_account:raw}', ','))))
  AND ('${is_delinquent:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR is_delinquent::text IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${is_delinquent:raw}', ','))))
GROUP BY time, vote_account_pubkey
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  date_trunc('hour', time) AS time,
  node_identity_pubkey as metric,
  CAST(COALESCE(SUM(slots_skipped_delta), 0) AS DOUBLE) as "Skipped Slots (Hourly)",
  CAST(COALESCE(AVG(vote_lag_slots), 0) AS DOUBLE) as "Avg Vote Lag (slots)"
FROM solana_validator_health
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND time <= $__timeTo()
  AND slots_skipped_delta IS NOT NULL
  AND vote_lag_slots IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY date_trunc('hour', time), node_identity_pubkey
HAVING SUM(slots_skipped_delta) > 10
  AND AVG(vote_lag_slots) < 100
ORDER BY time ASC, SUM(slots_skipped_delta) DESC

panels.title: High Skipped Slots but Low Vote Lag (TPU/Packet Loss Issues)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_trunc('hour', time) AS time,
  node_identity_pubkey as metric,
  CAST(COALESCE(AVG(vote_lag_slots), 0) AS DOUBLE) as "Avg Vote Lag (slots)",
  CAST(COALESCE(COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE is_delinquent = true), 0) AS DOUBLE) as "Delinquent Samples",
  CAST(COALESCE(SUM(blocks_produced_delta), 0) AS DOUBLE) as "Blocks Produced (Hourly)"
FROM solana_validator_health
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND time <= $__timeTo()
  AND vote_lag_slots IS NOT NULL
  AND blocks_produced_delta IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY date_trunc('hour', time), node_identity_pubkey
HAVING AVG(vote_lag_slots) > 500
  AND COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE is_delinquent = true) > 30
  AND SUM(blocks_produced_delta) < 10
ORDER BY time ASC, AVG(vote_lag_slots) DESC

panels.title: High Vote Lag + High Delinquency + Low Production (Node Unhealthy)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_trunc('hour', time) AS time,
  node_identity_pubkey as metric,
  CAST(COALESCE(SUM(credits_delta), 0) AS DOUBLE) as "Credits Delta Sum",
  CAST(COALESCE(AVG(vote_lag_slots), 0) AS DOUBLE) as "Avg Vote Lag (slots)",
  CAST(COALESCE(SUM(blocks_produced_delta), 0) AS DOUBLE) as "Blocks Produced (Hourly)"
FROM solana_validator_health
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND time <= $__timeTo()
  AND vote_lag_slots IS NOT NULL
  AND blocks_produced_delta IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY date_trunc('hour', time), node_identity_pubkey
HAVING AVG(vote_lag_slots) < 100
  AND SUM(blocks_produced_delta) < 5
ORDER BY time ASC, COALESCE(SUM(credits_delta), 0) DESC

panels.title: Good Voting but Poor Production (Leadership Path Issue)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  bp.time,
  COALESCE(gn.version, 'unknown') as metric,
  CAST(SUM(bp.slots_skipped_delta) AS DOUBLE) as "Total Skipped Slots"
FROM solana_block_production_delta bp
LEFT JOIN solana_gossip_nodes_current gn ON bp.leader_identity_pubkey = gn.pubkey
WHERE bp.time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND bp.time <= $__timeTo()
  AND bp.slots_skipped_delta IS NOT NULL
  AND bp.slots_skipped_delta > 0
GROUP BY bp.time, COALESCE(gn.version, 'unknown')
ORDER BY bp.time ASC

SELECT
  date_trunc('hour', va.time) as time,
  COALESCE(gn.version, 'unknown') as metric,
  CAST(AVG(va.cluster_slot - va.last_vote_slot) AS DOUBLE) as "Avg Vote Lag (slots)"
FROM solana_vote_account_activity_raw va
LEFT JOIN solana_gossip_nodes_current gn ON va.node_identity_pubkey = gn.pubkey
WHERE va.time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND va.time <= $__timeTo()
GROUP BY date_trunc('hour', va.time), COALESCE(gn.version, 'unknown')
ORDER BY time ASC

WITH bad_producers AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT leader_identity_pubkey
  FROM solana_block_production_delta
  WHERE time >= GREATEST($__timeFrom(), NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour')
    AND time <= $__timeTo()
    AND slots_skipped_delta IS NOT NULL
    AND slots_skipped_delta > 10
)
SELECT
  bp.time,
  bp.leader_identity_pubkey as metric,
  CASE WHEN gn.pubkey IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as "Not Present in Gossip"
FROM solana_block_production_delta bp
INNER JOIN bad_producers bp2 ON bp.leader_identity_pubkey = bp2.leader_identity_pubkey
LEFT JOIN solana_gossip_nodes_current gn ON bp.leader_identity_pubkey = gn.pubkey
WHERE bp.time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND bp.time <= $__timeTo()
  AND gn.pubkey IS NULL
ORDER BY bp.time ASC

panels.title: Not Present in Gossip (Last 1h) for Leaders with Bad Production

targets.rawSql:
WITH latest_stake AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT
    va.node_identity_pubkey,
    va.activated_stake_sol
  FROM (
    SELECT
      node_identity_pubkey,
      activated_stake_sol,
      ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY node_identity_pubkey ORDER BY time DESC) AS rn
    FROM solana_vote_account_activity_raw
    WHERE activated_stake_sol IS NOT NULL
      AND time >= $__timeFrom()
  ) va
  WHERE va.rn = 1
)
SELECT
  bp.time,
  bp.leader_identity_pubkey as metric,
  CAST(COALESCE(bp.slots_skipped_delta, 0) * COALESCE(ls.activated_stake_sol, 0) AS DOUBLE) as "Skipped Slots Weighted by Stake"
FROM solana_block_production_delta bp
LEFT JOIN latest_stake ls ON bp.leader_identity_pubkey = ls.node_identity_pubkey
WHERE bp.time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND bp.time <= $__timeTo()
  AND bp.slots_skipped_delta IS NOT NULL
  AND bp.slots_skipped_delta > 0
  AND ls.activated_stake_sol IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY bp.time ASC, (COALESCE(bp.slots_skipped_delta, 0) * COALESCE(ls.activated_stake_sol, 0)) DESC

WITH latest_stake AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT
    va.node_identity_pubkey,
    va.activated_stake_sol
  FROM (
    SELECT
      node_identity_pubkey,
      activated_stake_sol,
      ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY node_identity_pubkey ORDER BY time DESC) AS rn
    FROM solana_vote_account_activity_raw
    WHERE activated_stake_sol IS NOT NULL
      AND time >= $__timeFrom()
  ) va
  WHERE va.rn = 1
),
top_stake_validators AS (
  SELECT node_identity_pubkey
  FROM latest_stake
  ORDER BY activated_stake_sol DESC
  LIMIT 50
)
SELECT
  bp.time,
  bp.leader_identity_pubkey as metric,
  CAST(COALESCE(bp.slots_skipped_delta, 0) AS DOUBLE) as "Skipped Slots (Hourly)",
  CAST(COALESCE(ls.activated_stake_sol, 0) AS DOUBLE) as "Activated Stake (SOL)"
FROM solana_block_production_delta bp
INNER JOIN top_stake_validators ts ON bp.leader_identity_pubkey = ts.node_identity_pubkey
LEFT JOIN latest_stake ls ON bp.leader_identity_pubkey = ls.node_identity_pubkey
WHERE bp.time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND bp.time <= $__timeTo()
  AND bp.slots_skipped_delta IS NOT NULL
  AND bp.slots_skipped_delta > 0
ORDER BY bp.time ASC, bp.slots_skipped_delta DESC

panels.title: Worst Producers Among Top 50 Stake Validators

targets.rawSql:
WITH latest_stake AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT
    va.node_identity_pubkey,
    va.activated_stake_sol
  FROM (
    SELECT
      node_identity_pubkey,
      activated_stake_sol,
      ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY node_identity_pubkey ORDER BY time DESC) AS rn
    FROM solana_vote_account_activity_raw
    WHERE activated_stake_sol IS NOT NULL
      AND time >= $__timeFrom()
  ) va
  WHERE va.rn = 1
),
network_skips AS (
  SELECT
    SUM(COALESCE(bp.slots_skipped_delta, 0)) as total_network_skips
  FROM solana_block_production_delta bp
  WHERE bp.time >= $__timeFrom()
    AND bp.time <= $__timeTo()
    AND bp.slots_skipped_delta IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT
  bp.leader_identity_pubkey as "Leader Identity",
  CAST(COALESCE(ls.activated_stake_sol, 0) AS DOUBLE) as "Activated Stake (SOL)",
  CAST(SUM(COALESCE(bp.slots_skipped_delta, 0)) AS DOUBLE) as "Total Skipped Slots",
  CAST(SUM(COALESCE(bp.slots_skipped_delta, 0)) * COALESCE(ls.activated_stake_sol, 0) AS DOUBLE) as "Contribution to Network Skip Count",
  CASE
    WHEN ns.total_network_skips > 0 THEN CAST((SUM(COALESCE(bp.slots_skipped_delta, 0)) / ns.total_network_skips * 100.0) AS DOUBLE)
    ELSE NULL
  END as "% of Network Skips"
FROM solana_block_production_delta bp
CROSS JOIN network_skips ns
LEFT JOIN latest_stake ls ON bp.leader_identity_pubkey = ls.node_identity_pubkey
WHERE bp.time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND bp.time <= $__timeTo()
  AND bp.slots_skipped_delta IS NOT NULL
  AND bp.slots_skipped_delta > 0
GROUP BY bp.leader_identity_pubkey, ls.activated_stake_sol, ns.total_network_skips
ORDER BY "Contribution to Network Skip Count" DESC
LIMIT 50

panels.title: Contribution to Network Skip Count by Validator (Top 50)

list.label: Vote Account
list.name: vote_account
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT vote_account_pubkey FROM solana_vote_account_activity_raw ORDER BY vote_account_pubkey

list.label: Delinquent Status
list.name: is_delinquent
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT is_delinquent::text FROM solana_vote_account_activity_raw ORDER BY is_delinquent
